reference.name: LM2 for Hydro, LM3V for veg

simulationRun.longName: Simulation using HIRAM-C360 using future SSTs and RCP 4.5 forcing for the period 2026-2035
simulationRun.description: Model was run in AMIP mode with SST and sea ice concentration determined from the HadISST1.1 data set (Rayner et al 2003) plus a monthly mean SST and sea ice concentration anomaly computed as the difference between either the historical and RCP4.5 experiment for either the GFDL-ESM2M (p1) or CM3 (p2) models. The sea-ice model assumes that each grid point is either fully ice-covered or ice-free and also assumes a uniform ice thickness determined from either the GFDL-ESM2M or CM3 model.

deployment.description: The resources(deployment) on which this simulation ran

reference.name: Jaguar
reference.description: Reference to a platform called Jaguar

reference.name: GFDL-HIRAM-C360
reference.description: Reference to a modelComponent called GFDL-HIRAM-C360

reference.name: Sea Ice Key Properties
reference.description: Reference to a modelComponent called Sea Ice Key Properties

detail.name: ice_thickness
detail.description: Model was run in AMIP mode with SST and sea ice concentration determined from the HadISST 1.1 data set (http://hadobs.metoffice.com/hadisst/) plus a monthly mean SST and sea ice concentration anomaly computed as the difference between the GFDL-ESM2M historical and RCP4.5 experiments. The sea-ice coverage is determined by truncating the resulting future sea-ice concentration to either 0 or 1. The uniform sea-ice thickness was reduced from it's AMIP value of 2.00 meters to 1.74 meters.

standard.name: QN_DRS
standard.description: The QN_DRS value allows mapping from data files to metadata being exported from the metadata questionnaire, and contains the institution name, the model name on which the simulation was run, the experiment name to which the simulation conforms, the simulation level base rip value, and finally the given start year for the simulation. The format of the string will thus be: institute_model_experiment_rip_startyear. Also note, that in particular cases, i.e. decadal and noVolc exps, the start date and expdate may differ - this will occur in those cases where the simulation start date is 1st january but still refers to an experiment for the year before. - (see cmip5 experiment design document)

ensemble.longName: Simulation using HIRAM-C360 using future SSTs and RCP 4.5 forcing for the period 2026-2035
ensemble.description: Additional ensemble members were started by from 01 January using different years with future SST/sea-ice from two different models.

reference.description: Reference to a experiment called 2.1 sst2030

reference.description: Reference to a simulation called sst2030 hiram-c360

reference.name: Sea Ice Key Properties

detail.name: ice_thickness
detail.description: Model was run in AMIP mode with SST and sea ice concentration determined from the HadISST 1.1 data set (http://hadobs.metoffice.com/hadisst/) plus a monthly mean SST and sea ice concentration anomaly computed as the difference between the GFDL-ESM2M historical and RCP4.5 experiments. The sea-ice coverage is determined by truncating the resulting future sea-ice concentration to either 0 or 1. The uniform sea-ice thickness was reduced from it's AMIP value of 2.00 meters to 1.74 meters.
Initial condition for C360 AMIP. Taken from 01 January 2024 during the 3-year spinup of a 2030 time-slice experiment using GFDL-ESM2M SSTs (r1i1p1). (See code modification sea-ice thickness ESM2M.)

numericalExperiment.rationale: 2030 time-slice. Explore the degree to which future climate states depend on the initial climate state.
numericalExperiment.description: Simulation of a future decade covering the years 2026-2035, with prescribed SSTs and sea ice concentration anomalies (relative to expt. 3.3).

initialCondition.name: 2.1.ic
initialCondition.description: A description of initial condition for the control run

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.rcp45_wmg
boundaryCondition.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 well mixed gases including CO2

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.rcp45_sls
boundaryCondition.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 short lived gas species

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.rcp45_aer
boundaryCondition.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 aerosols

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.rcp45_aer_pre
boundaryCondition.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 aerosol precursors

spatioTemporalConstraint.name: 2.1.stc.2026_10yr
spatioTemporalConstraint.description: Begin in 2026 and run for 10 years

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.sst
boundaryCondition.description: Prescribed SST anomolies (relative to exp 3.3) based on either (a) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 4.1) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 3.2), OR (b) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 1.2) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 1.1)

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.ssta
boundaryCondition.description: a) SST anom from expts 4.1 and 3.2

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.sst
boundaryCondition.description: Prescribed Sea Ice concentration anomolies (relative to exp 3.3) based on either (a) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 4.1) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 3.2), OR (b) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 1.2) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 1.1)

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.ssta
boundaryCondition.description: a)Sea Ice anom from expts 4.1 and 3.2

boundaryCondition.name: 2.1.bc.sstb
boundaryCondition.description: b)Sea Ice anom from expts 1.2 and 1.1

dataObject.description: Contains the netCDF file aerosol.climatology.nc which has the monthly-mean CMIP5-recommended aerosols for RCP4.5.

CMIP5-recommended WMGHGs for RCP 4.5. Contains the files: ch4_gblannualdata chemlbf co2_data.nc co2_gblannualdata f113_gblannualdata f11_gblannualdata f12_gblannualdata f22_gblannualdata n2o_gblannualdata README_cmip5_rcp45

esmModelGrid.description: Cubed-sphere grid used in the HIRAM experiments. Each face of the cube has 360 x 360 points or approximately 0.25 degree resolution.

horizontalResolution.description: Averaged cell size: approximately 25x25 km. . Refinement details: Cubed-sphere with an equal distance (along the edges) Gnomonic projection.
